ModMetaData.name: CE Black Powder revolvers
ModMetaData.author: Auggie and Kripto
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a variety of vintage black powder revolvers to CE.
Include : Colt 1851 Navy Colt Walker Walch Revolver Remington New Army Starr Revolver LeMat Revolver Colt Revolving Shotgun
Test
Special thanks to Kripto, Serina Enjoyer, and the CE team for all art assets
